entry.title: $2500 // 2 Bed $$/ 1 Bath at 1610 Bedford Ave
entry.content:
2 Bed / 1 Bath at 1610 Bedford Ave - Unit: 1A in Crown Heights, Brooklyn. No Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Franklin Av, Botanic Garden. Spacious 2 bed 1 bath unit. Both rooms fit queen sized rooms and has closet space. Two blocks to the trains at Franklin Ave. Photos of similar unit 1D.

Move in Costs: First and Security
Credit: Healthy
Available:Now
Fee: No Fee

Contact Me directly at show contact info to schedule an appointment


AMENITIES

Outdoor Space
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher

entry.title: $2700 // Sunny & beautiful 2 bedroom apartment
entry.content:
Sunny, spacious and clean 2 bedroom apartment located in heart of trendy Fort Greene neighborhood. Unit has beautiful hardwood floors throughout apartment, spacious bedrooms with great closet space. Large living/dining room. Heat and hot water are included in rent. No pets are allowed. tenant pays electricity and cooking gas. Neighborhood park and tennis court across street from apartment. Minutes from restaurants, shopping, Barclays Center Atlantic Ave subways and LIRR. Minutes from downtown Manhattan. One month rent for broker fee, application fee is $25.
Please contact Berma Young 347-439-5594 to schedule a showing.
